item.title: Girls who C0de
item.description: Girls who code Today I watched a documentary called. Girls who code. I really enjoyed the doc.

item.title: My project code folder
item.description: Today I wrote some code. I created a application that tells me how hot it is! Check it out!

item.title: NHIS HELL
item.description:
Today we worked on our board gaame: NHIS HELL. The game is centered around my school. Nanakuli High School. In players are students who are decending the schools levels one at time. Trying to find there way out of this Hell of a school.

The game is Dig Dug meets Dantes Inferno.
